pkgmetadata.longdescription: Data Analysis for ODS and Case-Cohort Designs with Interval- Censoring // Sieve semiparametric likelihood methods for analyzing interval-censored failure time data from an outcome- dependent sampling (ODS) design and from a case-cohort design. Zhou, Q., Cai, J., and Zhou, H. (2018) doi:10.1111/biom.12744; Zhou, Q., Zhou, H., and Cai, J. (2017) doi:10.1093/biomet/asw067.
